archimate:BusinessRole.name: Verifier
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: An Entity who requests a Credential or Proof from a Holder and verifies it in order to make a trust decision about a Sovrin Entity. Based on the definition provided by the W3C Verifiable Claims Working Group. See also Relying Party.
